attributes.action: ensure consistency and fairness in the various football leagues of the UK by making the various teams play in their own domestic leagues. For example, Cardiff should play in the Welsh League. This would also allow all teams to compete fairly within their domestic leagues for places in the Champion's League.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Historically, certain Welsh clubs joined the English domestic leagues as there was no Welsh league. However that situation was rectified some years ago and as such those teams should play in their own domestic league.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the FA.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
